languages.text: "Гладиаторская арена культа Губительной жажды. Здесь обретают новую молодость господа и умирает жалкое мясо, скапливающееся в Прорве".
"The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."
languages.original_text: "Гладиаторская арена культа Губительной жажды. Здесь обретают новую молодость господа и умирает жалкое мясо, скапливающееся в Прорве".

traits.locale_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: « Vous êtes dans l'arène du Culte de la Soif Fatale. C'est ici que les maîtres viennent se restaurer et où la chair fraîche de l'Abîme est transformée en troupe de gladiateurs. »
languages.original_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes dans l'arène du Culte de la Soif Fatale. C'est ici que les maîtres viennent se restaurer et où la chair fraîche de l'Abîme est transformée en troupe de gladiateurs. »
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: “是‘致命饥渴’教派神圣的竞技场。主人会在这里寻找新秀，而来自裂隙的活畜会在这里遭到屠宰。”
languages.original_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."

traits.locale_text: “是‘致命饥渴’教派神圣的竞技场。主人会在这里寻找新秀，而来自裂隙的活畜会在这里遭到屠宰。”
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: 「「宿命の渇き」教団のアリーナ。ここはご主人様たちが新たな若さを手に入れ、裂け目から来た哀れなエサどもが死に至る場所なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."

traits.locale_text: 「「宿命の渇き」教団のアリーナ。ここはご主人様たちが新たな若さを手に入れ、裂け目から来た哀れなエサどもが死に至る場所なのだ」
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: "Die Gladiatorenarena vom Kult des Todesdursts. Die Meister zieht es für neue Jugend hierher und das erbärmliche Fleisch aus der Kluft landet hier zum Sterben."
languages.original_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gladiatorenarena vom Kult des Todesdursts. Die Meister zieht es für neue Jugend hierher und das erbärmliche Fleisch aus der Kluft landet hier zum Sterben."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: «La arena de gladiadores del Culto de la Sed Letal. Aquí es donde vienen los amos para renovar su juventud, y donde vienen a morir los patéticos cachos de carne del Abismo».
languages.original_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."

traits.locale_text: «La arena de gladiadores del Culto de la Sed Letal. Aquí es donde vienen los amos para renovar su juventud, y donde vienen a morir los patéticos cachos de carne del Abismo».
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: "Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'na ait gladyatör arenası. Efendiler buraya gençlik için geliyor, Yarık'tan getirilen âciz et parçalarının ölümüne tanık oluyor."
languages.original_text: "The gladiatorial arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. This is where masters come for a new youth and where pathetic meat from the Chasm is brought to die."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'na ait gladyatör arenası. Efendiler buraya gençlik için geliyor, Yarık'tan getirilen âciz et parçalarının ölümüne tanık oluyor."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack
